statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY gender ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, dietary_preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE dietary_preferences->>'diet' = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE dietary_preferences->>'category' = 'Vegan' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT username, dietary_preferences->>'type' AS preference_type FROM user_profiles WHERE dietary_preferences->>'category' = 'Vegetarian' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'female'
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian'
SELECT user_id, username, age, dietary_preferences FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, cuisine_type FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE dietary_preferences LIKE '%vegetarian%';
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, rating FROM user_recipe_preferences WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, favorite FROM user_recipe_preferences WHERE favorite = true;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE dietary_preference = 'vegetarian';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_recipe_preferences WHERE rating > 4 AND favorite = true;

SELECT user_profiles.name, recipes.recipe_name FROM user_profiles JOIN user_recipe_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_recipe_preferences.user_id JOIN recipes ON user_recipe_preferences.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id WHERE user_profiles.gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE dietary_preference='Vegetarian';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level='Easy';
SELECT * FROM user_favorites WHERE user_id=123;

SELECT user_profiles.username, recipes.recipe_name FROM user_profiles JOIN user_favorites ON user_profiles.user_id = user_favorites.user_id JOIN recipes ON user_favorites.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE dietary_preference='Vegetarian';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level='Intermediate' ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.recipe_name, r.cuisine_type FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_favorites uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id JOIN recipes r ON uf.recipe_id = r.recipe_id;
SELECT i.ingredient_id, i.ingredient_name FROM ingredients i WHERE i.ingredient_name LIKE '%cheese%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time_minutes FROM recipes WHERE cook_time_minutes < 60;
SELECT preference_name, preference_description FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM recipe_ratings WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time_minutes FROM recipes WHERE cook_time_minutes < 60 ORDER BY cook_time_minutes ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%chicken%' ORDER BY recipe_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.username, r.recipe_name, rr.rating FROM users u INNER JOIN recipe_ratings rr ON u.user_id = rr.user_id INNER JOIN recipes r ON rr.recipe_id = r.recipe_id WHERE rr.rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY rr.rating DESC LIMIT 5;
